channel.title: Making AWESOME Stuff For Your Serv. Banners/Client Bg's. [MARK 2]
channel.description:
[size=10pt][b]Well, due to popular request im going to open my service of creating graphics for client backgrounds and banners again. =]. I will be ignoring anything davidi2 posts on my thread.[/b][/size]
Although, this time id like a little bit more info, so I know that my graphic will be used.. for something atleast.
[b]You must fill out ALL areas. Even if you don't know or haven't started to think up certain areas, make it up then. It makes it much easier for me and helps me provide a more awesome graphic for you.[/b]
[size=12pt][b]1) FULL Name 2) Slogan 3) Web address (If you dont have a website, you shouldnt be asking for graphics! develop your server some more or pre reserve a .tk at www.dot.tk) 4) Owner of the server[/b][/size]
Feel free to tell me what kind of picture you want as the background, i'd really enjoy a reply back from you guys, especially if its improvements for what ive created.
And finally, a[b]ll constructive criticism is welcomed, but flame will not be tolerated[/b]. Please structure and think before you post criticism.
What ive done so far (since the start of this new topic) [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/ajwghg.png[/img]

item.title: Making AWESOME Stuff For Your Serv. Banners/Client Bg's. [MARK 2]
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

Not sure if you’re still making banners anymore, but if you got the time, you think you could make me two banners?

Client background:

Name: EmulousPlus
Slogan: A new era.
Website: http://www.emulousplus.com
Owner: Emulous

Website banner:

Name: EmulousPlus
Dimensions: 416x112
Slogan: A new era
Colors: Blue-ish.

For a better view of the website color, visit my site and look for yourself.

Thanks in all advance, - Thomas.

Read full topic

item.title: Making AWESOME Stuff For Your Serv. Banners/Client Bg's. [MARK 2]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

  1. The Divine
  2. A Revoloution In RuneScape Servers
  3. I’ve Reserved Http://TheDivine.tk But only to a blank Page; For now I’m focussing on Development.
  4. Me.

I’de Like a client background and a banner, Any size for now I’de like it to look modern and clean, but with a RuneScape theme to it, Work your magic <3.

item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“DemisePking, post:38, topic:336828”][quote author=statsflamescape link=topic=433245.msg3180831#msg3180831 date=1271285529]
DEMISE i tryed out my new sick pic but its a little too small i think the dimension of the client is 765x503 so could you try and make the pic bigger?
[/quote]

Lol, sorry my mistake. When i exported as a PNG it was scaled down. This is it in the exact dimensions you specified, if this is wrong then its your fault - not mine.

ajwghg.png765×503

PS: Please, ignore david. He’s just trying to seek attention on my thread[/quote]
I see no RS logo on there.

@PS: No, I was trying to help. If mine had worked then you have known the exact dimensions.

Read full topic
